joke: There are 10 types of people in the world: Those who understand binary, and those who don’t.
Why do programmers always mix up Halloween and Christmas? Because Oct 31 = Dec 25.
How do programmers count cows? 1, 10, 11… (binary counting)
Why do hexadecimal numbers make bad roommates? Because they’re always high-fiving (0xF)!
To understand recursion, you must first understand recursion.
A Boolean walks into a bar. The bartender asks, 'Do you want a drink?' The Boolean replies, 'True.'
How many programmers does it take to change a light bulb? None. That’s a hardware problem.
Why did the programmer get stuck in the shower? The instructions said: Lather, Rinse, Repeat.
I would tell you a joke about Git… But you might not `merge` it well.
Why do Java developers wear glasses? Because they don’t C#.
Why did the programmer go broke? Because he used up all his cache.
A SQL query walks into a bar, walks up to two tables, and asks: 'Can I join you?'
Why was the function sad after a breakup? It lost its closure.
Why did the coder get kicked out of school? Because he kept breaking class rules.
Why do programmers hate nature? It has too many bugs.
What do you call 8 hobbits? A hobbyte.
There are 3 kinds of people in the world: Those who can count in ternary, those who can’t, and those who didn’t expect ternary.
